name: shrimp's solo adventre
description:
Shrimp goes on an adventure all by her self to save a very special face.

failboat's channel:https://www.youtube.com/failboat

Failboat's discord:https://discord.com/invite/failboat (im sometimes there)

Music and enemies form miitopia (nintendo).

Arrow keys to move, space bar to attack.

If it's very well recived im might make a sequel, and for the moment it is so might start thinking in some posible ideas
